      • isAccessAllowed

        protected abstract boolean isAccessAllowed(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                           javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
                                    throws Exception
        Returns true if the request is allowed to proceed through the filter normally, or false if the request should be handled by the onAccessDenied method instead.
        Parameters:
        request - the incoming ServletRequest
        response - the outgoing ServletResponse
        Returns:
        true if the request should proceed through the filter normally, false if the request should be processed by this filter's onAccessDenied method instead.
        Throws:
        Exception - if an error occurs during processing.

      • onAccessDenied

        protected abstract boolean onAccessDenied(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                          javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
                                   throws Exception
        Processes requests where the subject was denied access as determined by the isAccessAllowed.
        Parameters:
        request - the incoming ServletRequest
        response - the outgoing ServletResponse
        Returns:
        true if the request should continue to be processed; false if the subclass will handle/render the response directly.
        Throws:
        Exception - if there is an error processing the request.
        Since:
        1.0

      • isContinue

        protected boolean isContinue(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                             javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
                      throws Exception
        Description copied from class: HttpFilter
        Returns true if this filter should allow the filter chain to continue to execute, false if the filter will commit and/or render the response directly. This method is only invoked if HttpFilter.isEnabled(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse) is true.

        This default implementation always returns true and can be overridden by subclasses for custom logic.

        Overrides:
        isContinue in class HttpFilter
        Parameters:
        request - incoming request
        response - outbound response
        Returns:
        true if this filter should allow the filter chain to continue to execute, false if the filter will commit and/or render the response directly.
        Throws:
        Exception - in the case of an error

      • isLoginRequest

        protected boolean isLoginRequest(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
